eval_criteria.description: Agent response is relevant to user request and answers the question
Agent routes request to the correct capability (SQL/Quality/Exploration/Ingestion)
Agent uses appropriate tools for the requested capability
Response is well-formatted, professional, and easy to understand
Agent handles errors gracefully and provides helpful guidance

pass_fail_criteria.summary: Agent must achieve 75% overall score with minimum 80% on relevance and routing to pass
